Name: "Chef"
Definition: a person whose job is to cook, especially the most senior person in a restaurant, hotel, etc

Name: "Teacher"
Definition: a person whose job is teaching, especially in a school

Name: "Guitarist"
Definition: a person who plays the guitar.

Name: "Waiter"
Definition: "a person whose job is to serve customers at their tables in a restaurant, etc."

Name: "Doctor"
Definition: a person who has been trained in medical science, whose job is to treat people who are ill or injured

Name: "Driver"
Definition: a person who drives a vehicle

Name: "Farmer"
Definition: a person who owns or manages a farm

Name: "Photographer"
Definition: a person who takes photographs, especially as a job

Name: "Lawyer"
Definition: a person who is trained and qualified to advise people about the law and to represent them in court, and to write legal documents

Name: "Engineer"
Definition: "a person whose job involves designing and building engines, machines, roads, bridges, etc."

Name: "Beef"
Definition: meat that comes from a cow

Name: "Cupcake"
Definition: "?a small cake, baked in a paper container that is like a cup in shape and often with icing on top"

Name: "Hotdog"
Definition: a hot sausage served in a long bread roll

Name: "Salad"
Definition: "a mixture of raw vegetables such as lettuce, tomato and cucumber, usually served with other food as part of a meal"

Name: "Soup"
Definition: "?a liquid food made by boiling meat, vegetables, etc. in water, often eaten as the first course of a meal"

Name: "French Fry"
Definition: "a long thin piece of potato fried in oil or fat"

Name: "Chip"
Definition: a long thin piece of potato fried in oil or fat

Name: "Pizza"
Definition: "an Italian dish consisting of a flat round bread base with cheese, tomatoes, vegetables, meat, etc. on top"

Name: "Spaghetti"
Definition: ?pasta in the shape of long thin pieces that look like string when they are cooked

Name: "Turkey"
Definition: a large bird that is often kept for its meat, eaten especially at Christmas in the UK and at Thanksgiving in the US

Name: "Milkshake"
Definition: ?a drink made of milk, and sometimes ice cream, with the added taste of fruit or chocolate, which is mixed or shaken until it is full of bubbles

Name: "Tea"
Definition: the dried leaves (called tea leaves) of the tea bus

Name: "Coffee"
Definition: a hot drink made from coffee powder and boiling water. It may be drunk with milk and/or sugar added.

Name: "Beer"
Definition: an alcoholic drink made from malt with hops added to give it taste. There are many types of beer.

Name: "Hot chocolate"
Definition: a drink made by mixing chocolate powder with hot water or milk; a cup of this drink

Name: "Milk"
Definition: the white liquid produced by cows, goats and some other animals as food for their young and used as a drink by humans

Name: "Soda"
Definition: fizzy water (= water with bubbles) used as a drink on its own or to mix with alcoholic drinks or fruit juice (originally made with sodium bicarbonate)

Name: "Juice"
Definition: the liquid that comes from fruit or vegetables; a drink made from this

Name: "Wine"
Definition: an alcoholic drink made from the juice of grapes that has been left to ferment. There are many different kinds of wine.

Name: "Cocktail"
Definition: a drink usually made from a mixture of one or more spirits (= strong alcoholic drinks) and fruit juice. It can also be made without alcohol.

Name: USA
Definition: United States of America

Name: UK (United Kingdom)
Definition: ?United Kingdom

Name: Australia
Definition: ?a large island country and continent in the south-west Pacific Ocean. Its capital city is Canberra

Name: Mexico
Definition: a country in southern North America

Name: India
Definition: ?a country in southern Asia which used to be part of the British Empire. It became independent and a member of the Commonwealth in 1947.

Name: France
Definition: ?a country in western Europe

Name: China
Definition: a country of eastern Asia bordering on the Pacific; the most populous country in the world; a republic whose capital is Beijing

Name: Germany
Definition: ?a country in central Europe

Name: Japan
Definition: ?a country consisting of a group of islands in eastern Asia

Name: Thailand
Definition: a country in South East Asia

Name: "Jeans"
Definition: "trousers made of denim (= a type of strong cotton)"

Name: "Kimono"
Definition: a traditional Japanese piece of clothing like a long loose dress with wide sleeves (= parts covering the arms), worn on formal occasions; a dressing gown or robe in this style

Name: "Sari"
Definition: ?a long piece of cloth that is wrapped around the body and worn as the main piece of clothing by women in South Asia

Name: "Trousers"
Definition: a piece of clothing that covers the lower body and is divided into two parts to cover each leg separately

Name: "Jacket"
Definition: a piece of clothing worn on the top half of the body over a shirt, etc. that has arms and fastens down the front; a short, light coat

Name: "Dress"
Definition: a piece of women’s clothing that is made in one piece and covers the body down to the legs, sometimes reaching to below the knees, or to the ankles

Name: "T-shirt"
Definition: an informal shirt, usually with short sleeves (= arms) no collar or buttons, or just a few buttons at the top

Name: "Sweater"
Definition: a piece of clothing for the upper part of the body, made of wool or cotton, with long sleeves

Name: "Sneaker"
Definition: a shoe that you wear for sports or as informal clothing

Name: "Sandal"
Definition: a type of light open shoe that is worn in warm weather. The top part consists of leather bands that fasten the sole to your foot.

Name: "Forest"
Definition: a large area of land that is thickly covered with trees

Name: "Waterfall"
Definition: a place where a stream or river falls from a high place, for example over a cliff or rock

Name: "Desert"
Definition: ?a large area of land that has very little water and very few plants growing on it. Many deserts are covered by sand.

Name: "Flower"
Definition: the coloured part of a plant from which the seed or fruit develops. Flowers usually grow at the end of a stem and last only a short time.

Name: "Island"
Definition: a piece of land that is completely surrounded by water

Name: "Lake"
Definition: a large area of water that is surrounded by land

Name: "'Mountain
Definition: a very high hill, often with rocks near the top

Name: "Sunset"
Definition: the time when the sun goes down and night begins

Name: "Moon"
Definition: " the round object that moves around the earth once every 27½ days and shines at night by light reflected from the sun"

Name: "Field"
Definition: "an area of land in the country used for growing crops or keeping animals in, usually surrounded by a fence, etc."
